

np.tile
repeat the whole array multiple times

np.split
split an array into multiple sub-array

```
# examples
x = np.arange(9.0)
np.split(x,3)


x = np.arange(8.0)
np.split(x,[3,5,6,10])

```

nd.clip(x,min,max)


nd.reshape((0,0,-1,stride))
0 means copying this dimension from input to the output shape

isinstance(anchor_scales,(list,tuple))(aber)

# method for dict-like
__getitem__
__setitem__


## Import Python Package
1. collections
* namedtuple

2. functools
*partical
